item.description:
Steptember Continues....

The Original Steppers of Boston 2006 Inc. Invite you to attend a Steppin Mix and mingle with Master Instructor Sarah Teagle

1pm to 4pm
Cove: $10


Just added as of 9/16/10:
New moves....
New Music...
Sunday ...A new line dance


STEPtember to Remember

VERVE LOUNGE
Non Stop Steppin
Mix, mingle and step with Sarah before she departs for Atlanta

ATTIRE STEPPING TEE SHIRTS AND COMFORTABLE SHOES


Parking Hampton Inn Hotel 2 hour validation
Enter off Harrison Av

BMC Parking garage located at 710 Albany Street $5.00 for the day

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006
